author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Captivating stage shows return to Germany’s musical capital HamburgTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Captivating stage shows return to Germany’s musical capital Hamburg Published  
The love story from Andrew Lloyd Webber’s most successful musical of all time is not over yet. The tale continues in a new production full of passion and heartfelt emotion that is now coming to Hamburg.See Love Never Dies and other captivating stage shows in Germany’s musical capital, Hamburg.
Ten years on from the thrilling events at the Paris Opera House, the Phantom once again crosses paths with his one true love, French singer Christine Daaé. This time round the scenes unfold in New York, where the Phantom cunningly lures his now married beloved to his Coney Island Variety Theatre. It’s guaranteed to be a dramatic reunion.
There’s also plenty to keep musical fans entertained in Berlin, especially with the Broadway classic Chicago having recently returned to Germany’s capital city.Chicago’s season in Berlin runs from 11 October 2015 to 17 January 2016.
